title: Define phone/watch session messaging contracts
description: Specify payloads and state updates for session start, control commands, and metrics/state mirroring between phone and watch.

title: Create design decision record (DDR) template
description: Add a standard DDR template for recording detailed design choices (problem, options, decision, rationale, tradeoffs).

title: Create iOS app scaffolding
description: Set up the base Xcode project, app structure, and minimal navigation shell after architecture/C4 docs are approved.

title: Implement calendar integration for discovery context
description: Request Calendar permissions, load events for context, and allow include/exclude calendars in preferences.

comments.author: aaston
comments.text: Defer calendar integration until after v1; treat as refinement work.

title: Implement workout search result sorting (initially by workout name)
description:
Scope:
- Create/update architecture/design documentation covering search result ordering
- Implement search result sorting (initially by workout name)
- Add unit tests to verify ordering

Notes:
- Treat this as a short epic; split into tasks if the work grows

title: Implement workout execution timers
description: Build section/element timer modes (EMOM, interval, AMRAP timer, stopwatch/countdown) with pause/resume and background recovery. These timers apply to workout sections or blocks, not the overall session.
acceptance_criteria: Section/block timers support EMOM, interval, AMRAP, and stopwatch/countdown modes with pause/resume and background recovery. Timer UI is scoped to section/block context, not session start/end.

title: Add unit tests for search indexing excludes section headers
description: Create XCTest coverage to ensure search indexing ignores structural section headers (Prep/Push/Pull) unless present in title or substantive content. Use wa-552.2/wa-ux1 context and include acceptance cases like searching 'push' only returns workouts with 'push' in title/body.

title: Implement knowledge base loader and Markdown parsing
description: Load and index resources/workouts/*.md on-device; parse YAML front matter and headings into metadata while preserving raw Markdown for display.

title: Add Discover filter chips wired to search results (equipment/duration/location)
description: Implement filter chips for equipment/duration/location that constrain search results, and update the UI state to toggle filters.

title: Execution + history foundation
description: Session timing, persistence, and history views that other flows depend on.

title: Implement workout execution timers
description: Build section/element timer modes (EMOM, interval, AMRAP timer, stopwatch/countdown) with pause/resume and background recovery. These timers apply to workout sections or blocks, not the overall session.
acceptance_criteria: Section/block timers support EMOM, interval, AMRAP, and stopwatch/countdown modes with pause/resume and background recovery. Timer UI is scoped to section/block context, not session start/end.

title: Implement session state model and Start/End flow
description: Add a session state model (idle/started/finished) and wire Start Session to begin an overall session timer (simple stopwatch/countup). Show the workout + running session timer, switch to Session tab, and provide End Session to stop timing and persist a completed session with metadata (date, duration, workout id, notes/results). Section/element timers (EMOM/interval/AMRAP) are out of scope here.
acceptance_criteria: Start Session transitions to started state and switches to Session tab. | Session view shows workout content and a running overall session timer. | End Session transitions to finished state and persists session metadata.

title: Persist in-progress session drafts for recovery
description: Persist lightweight SessionDraft on background/terminate and restore on launch to support recovery per DDR-0004. Define storage shape, write/update on state transitions, and clear on completion/cancel.

title: Build history list and detail views
description: Show past sessions in calendar/list form with detail view and basic exercise progress summaries.
notes: Sessions persist to Application Support at WorkoutApp/workout_sessions.json with ISO-8601 dates. Use WorkoutSessionStore.appendSession for completed sessions and updateNotes for note-only edits; sessions are immutable otherwise.

title: Draft TOGAF-based architecture document
description: Create an architecture doc covering business, application, information, and technology architectures; include high-level data models in information architecture. Organize overall doc by TOGAF domains; within each domain, use C4-style breakdown where applicable.

title: HealthKit/Fitness: add permissions, entitlements, and data model mapping
description: Add HealthKit capabilities, Info.plist usage strings, and map WorkoutSession metadata to HealthKit workout types. Define workout activity types and required fields for export.
acceptance_criteria: HealthKit capability and privacy strings are in place, and a clear mapping exists from app sessions to HKWorkout metadata.

title: Resolve bd daemon startup/lock issues
description: Investigate daemon startup slowness and registry.lock permissions; apply recommended fixes or config changes.

title: Queue and retry HealthKit export failures
description: Track HealthKit export status on sessions and retry failed exports (queue + backoff). Trigger retries on app launch/foreground and after permission changes.

title: Implement rules-based recommendation engine
description: Rank workouts using recent history and user preferences with explainable reasons; expose tunable weights for balance rules.

title: Create architecture decision record (ADR) template
description: Add a standard ADR template for recording architecture decisions (status, context, decision, consequences).

title: Make Today highlight card navigable to workout detail
description: Allow the highlighted 'Today' workout on Discover to be tapped and open the same workout detail view as items in Recommended.
acceptance_criteria: Today highlight is tappable. | Tapping opens the correct workout detail view.

title: Add docs/ folder and architecture/decision doc structure
description: Create docs/ with architecture doc, C4 doc, ADR/DDR registries, and templates placed in a consistent structure.

title: Add UI test for Settings toggle persistence
Support exact quoted string search
description: Enhance search parsing so quoted phrases are matched as exact strings (case-insensitive). Example: searching "push up" should match the contiguous phrase, not separate tokens 'push' and 'up'.

title: Design HealthKit/Fitness integration and session flow
description: Define HealthKit/Fitness integration first (permissions, workout mapping, export strategy, optional live session), then derive session state model, overall session timing, and section/element timers. Include data flow, lifecycle, and persistence responsibilities.
acceptance_criteria: Design notes cover HealthKit/Fitness integration decisions and how they inform session flow, overall timer, and section/block timers. Dependencies across implementation tickets reflect the design-first sequencing.

title: Discovery/search tuning
description: Performance and ranking tuning for search/discovery once core data is stable.

title: Improve workout loading/search performance; consider SQLite-backed storage
description: Loading workouts and running searches feels slow in the UI. Investigate performance bottlenecks (loader/indexing, search query path) and optimize. Consider persisting workouts/index in SQLite to reduce repeated parsing and improve query latency.

title: Search should ignore section headers like Prep/Push/Pull unless in title/body
description:
Search currently matches common section headers (e.g., Prep/Push/Pull) across many workouts.
Update keyword indexing to exclude structural section headings and other navigational labels unless the term appears in the workout title or substantive body text.
Restrict keyword indexing to content text (title, summary, items, prescriptions).
Acceptance: searching 'push' only returns workouts where 'push' is in title or meaningful content, not just a section label.

title: Add Discover filter chips wired to search results (equipment/duration/location)
description: Implement filter chips for equipment/duration/location that constrain search results, and update the UI state to toggle filters.

title: Tune workout search ranking weights and surface score debugging
description: Adjust keyword vs semantic weighting, test with sample queries, and optionally display per-result scores in the UI for tuning.

title: Implement session logging and storage
description: Persist completed sessions with workout identity, duration, notes, and per-exercise sets/reps/weight; keep sessions immutable except notes.

title: Fix xcodebuild failure: project marked damaged
description: xcodebuild build failed: project 'WorkoutApp' damaged/unrecognized selector on XCBuildConfiguration group. Investigate pbxproj validity and Xcode version compatibility; likely tied to recent project edits.
notes: Next-up issue; build must pass before tasks are considered complete.

title: Build workout search index (keyword + semantic embeddings)
description: Create an in-app search index for the knowledge base workouts. Generate embeddings for each workout (few hundred items), store a static list in app memory, and support cosine similarity search plus keyword matching over metadata (title/tags/equipment/etc.). Provide a simple search API that returns ranked results with scores and metadata.
acceptance_criteria: Search index built from KB workouts. | Keyword search works over workout metadata. | Semantic search uses embeddings + cosine similarity without external vector DB. | Combined ranking returns relevant results for a query.

title: Fix MarkdownUI CLI build failure (missing NetworkImage module)
description: xcodebuild fails in MarkdownUI with 'Unable to find module dependency: NetworkImage' when building WorkoutApp via CLI; investigate package integration or Xcode build settings so CLI build succeeds.

title: Create UI mockups/skeletons for key flows
description: Produce low-fidelity UI skeletons for core flows (discovery, workout detail/execution, history, settings) to surface data needs, navigation, and primary components. Focus on layout/sections and state placeholders rather than final styling.

title: HealthKit/Fitness: write completed sessions to HealthKit
description: Export completed WorkoutSession data to HealthKit as HKWorkout (and related samples if needed) so workouts appear in Health and Fitness apps.
acceptance_criteria: Completed sessions are written to HealthKit with correct activity type, duration, and metadata, and appear in Health/Fitness history.

title: Use knowledge base data for workout details and Discover lists
description: Replace mock/static workout content with knowledge base-derived metadata and markdown in Discover lists and workout detail screens. Ensure titles, sections, and overview content reflect the loaded KB workouts.
acceptance_criteria: Discover list items reflect KB metadata. | Workout detail renders KB markdown/sections. | No hard-coded mock workout content remains in Discover/detail.

title: Decide Markdown parser/renderer strategy
description: Select Markdown rendering/parsing approach (MarkdownUI vs swift-markdown + custom view). Define target capabilities: section headings, lists, inline emphasis, links, code blocks, and future custom styling. Decide whether we also parse into structured sections for filters/search.

title: Add phone-only fallback session flow and post-hoc HealthKit export
description: Allow sessions to start without a watch; run timers/instructions on phone and write a workout summary to HealthKit after completion (no live metrics).

title: Implement watch live HealthKit session controller
description: Build watch-side HKWorkoutSession + HKLiveWorkoutBuilder lifecycle, publish live metrics, and handle end/cancel paths.

title: Add architecture decision registry
description: Create an ADR index/registry document to list and track architecture decisions.

title: Improve workout loading/search performance; consider SQLite-backed storage
description: Loading workouts and running searches feels slow in the UI. Investigate performance bottlenecks (loader/indexing, search query path) and optimize. Consider persisting workouts/index in SQLite to reduce repeated parsing and improve query latency.

title: Tune workout search ranking weights and surface score debugging
description: Adjust keyword vs semantic weighting, test with sample queries, and optionally display per-result scores in the UI for tuning.

title: HealthKit: live workout session + in-session metrics
description: Integrate HKWorkoutSession/HKLiveWorkoutBuilder during active sessions to capture live metrics and background handling as designed.
acceptance_criteria: Active sessions can run a HealthKit workout session with live metrics per the design, without blocking the core session flow.

title: Add unit tests for quoted string search
description: Create XCTest coverage for exact quoted phrase matching (case-insensitive). Example: searching "push up" matches contiguous phrase only, not separate tokens. Use wa-4ll context.

title: Wire Discover search UI to results and detail navigation
description: Make the Discover search field interactive (focus, text entry) and show a results list that navigates to workout details. Integrate with the search API for keyword + semantic search and support clearing/resetting results.
acceptance_criteria: Search field accepts input and updates results. | Results list renders matching workouts. | Selecting a result navigates to the workout detail view. | Clearing search returns to default Discover content.

title: Implement session state model and Start/End flow
description: Add a session state model (idle/started/finished) and wire Start Session to begin an overall session timer (simple stopwatch/countup). Show the workout + running session timer, switch to Session tab, and provide End Session to stop timing and persist a completed session with metadata (date, duration, workout id, notes/results). Section/element timers (EMOM/interval/AMRAP) are out of scope here.
acceptance_criteria: Start Session transitions to started state and switches to Session tab. | Session view shows workout content and a running overall session timer. | End Session transitions to finished state and persists session metadata.

comments.author: Aaron Aston
comments.text: Timer backend is ready: use ExecutionTimer (ios/WorkoutApp/WorkoutApp/ExecutionTimer.swift) with a TimerConfiguration per block/section. Drive SessionViewModel.timer from ExecutionTimerSnapshot via snapshot(at:) using Date(), and wire start/pause/resume/stop to update timestamps for background recovery.

title: HealthKit session flow (watch + phone)
description: Coordinate HealthKit permissions, watch connectivity, live session controller, and phone-only fallback per DDR-0004.
notes: Notes (2026-01-24): Codebase scan: session models in ios/WorkoutApp/WorkoutApp/CoreModels.swift; session persistence via WorkoutSessionStore.json in ios/WorkoutApp/WorkoutApp/WorkoutSessionStore.swift; Settings has HealthKit toggle stub in ios/WorkoutApp/WorkoutApp/ContentView.swift; no Watch target/WCSession/HealthKit code yet. DDR-0004 at docs/decisions/ddr/ddr-0004-healthkit-session-flow.md. Dependencies suggest tackling wa-kvd and wa-2fi.2 before dnr.1/3/4/7; then do dnr.1 (entitlements+mapping), then phone export track (dnr.3 -> dnr.2 -> dnr.4) and watch track (dnr.6 -> dnr.5 -> dnr.7).

title: HealthKit/Fitness: add permissions, entitlements, and data model mapping
description: Add HealthKit capabilities, Info.plist usage strings, and map WorkoutSession metadata to HealthKit workout types. Define workout activity types and required fields for export.
acceptance_criteria: HealthKit capability and privacy strings are in place, and a clear mapping exists from app sessions to HKWorkout metadata.

title: Queue and retry HealthKit export failures
description: Track HealthKit export status on sessions and retry failed exports (queue + backoff). Trigger retries on app launch/foreground and after permission changes.

title: HealthKit/Fitness: write completed sessions to HealthKit
description: Export completed WorkoutSession data to HealthKit as HKWorkout (and related samples if needed) so workouts appear in Health and Fitness apps.
acceptance_criteria: Completed sessions are written to HealthKit with correct activity type, duration, and metadata, and appear in Health/Fitness history.

title: Add phone-only fallback session flow and post-hoc HealthKit export
description: Allow sessions to start without a watch; run timers/instructions on phone and write a workout summary to HealthKit after completion (no live metrics).

title: Implement watch live HealthKit session controller
description: Build watch-side HKWorkoutSession + HKLiveWorkoutBuilder lifecycle, publish live metrics, and handle end/cancel paths.

title: Add watch app target and WatchConnectivity bridge for sessions
description: Add watch app target, enable WatchConnectivity, and implement a bidirectional bridge for session start/pause/resume/finish plus reachability checks.

title: HealthKit: live workout session + in-session metrics
description: Integrate HKWorkoutSession/HKLiveWorkoutBuilder during active sessions to capture live metrics and background handling as designed.
acceptance_criteria: Active sessions can run a HealthKit workout session with live metrics per the design, without blocking the core session flow.

title: Search terms should be treated as AND, not OR
description: Search for multi-word queries should require all terms to match (with tolerance for simple normalization), so results like 'Full Body D (2/4)' are excluded when searching 'full body 1/4'. Acceptance: 'full body 1/4' returns only 1/4 variants, not 2/4 or 3/4.

title: Add tests for user preferences store
description:
Add unit + UI coverage for preferences persistence.

Unit tests:
- UserPreferencesStore returns .default when file missing or corrupted.
- Saving preferences round-trips (persist + reload).
- Toggling calendarSyncEnabled/healthKitSyncEnabled persists across store init.
- reload() overwrites in-memory prefs with disk values.
- Write failure does not crash (e.g., read-only location).

UI test:
- Settings toggles persist after app relaunch.

title: Add design decision registry
description: Create a DDR index/registry document to list and track detailed design decisions.

title: Update architecture/design based on UI mockups
description: Use the UI mockups to update architecture/design docs and decisions (data shapes, view models, storage boundaries, flows). Resulting updates should inform core model, data/storage, and logic implementation order.

title: Fix iPhone letterboxing by supporting iPhone device family; add unit tests
Set up XCTest target and unit test harness
description: Add a WorkoutAppTests target with XCTest, include a basic test runner and example test to validate the harness. Document how to run unit tests.

title: Investigate unexpected Xcode project updates for MarkdownUI/CoreModels
Define C4 software architecture (context, containers, components, code)
description: Produce C4 diagrams/specs; map data locations to containers and file-level components, with code-level sketches as needed. Align outputs to TOGAF domain sections (application/information/technology) so they can be embedded in the TOGAF architecture doc.

title: Define core data models (Workout, Template, Variant, Session, History)
description: Create the initial data model layer for workouts, templates/variants, and session history; include identifiers, provenance, and minimal metadata used by discovery and logging.

title: Add watch app target and WatchConnectivity bridge for sessions
description: Add watch app target, enable WatchConnectivity, and implement a bidirectional bridge for session start/pause/resume/finish plus reachability checks.

title: Persist in-progress session drafts for recovery
description: Persist lightweight SessionDraft on background/terminate and restore on launch to support recovery per DDR-0004. Define storage shape, write/update on state transitions, and clear on completion/cancel.

title: Add user preferences model and storage
description: Store discovery preferences (duration, location/equipment, focus, source toggles, exclusions) locally and expose read/write APIs.

title: Search should ignore section headers like Prep/Push/Pull unless in title/body
description:
Search currently matches common section headers (e.g., Prep/Push/Pull) across many workouts.
Update keyword indexing to exclude structural section headings and other navigational labels unless the term appears in the workout title or substantive body text.
Restrict keyword indexing to content text (title, summary, items, prescriptions).
Acceptance: searching 'push' only returns workouts where 'push' is in title or meaningful content, not just a section label.

title: Build history list and detail views
description: Show past sessions in calendar/list form with detail view and basic exercise progress summaries.
notes: Sessions persist to Application Support at WorkoutApp/workout_sessions.json with ISO-8601 dates. Use WorkoutSessionStore.appendSession for completed sessions and updateNotes for note-only edits; sessions are immutable otherwise.

title: Merge Slot
description: Exclusive access slot for serialized conflict resolution in the merge queue.

title: Add LLM configuration settings
description: Allow user to enter API key (Keychain), toggle sharing categories, and handle disabled/offline states gracefully.

title: Wire MarkdownUI into workout detail mock
description: Replace the workout detail preview section with a MarkdownUI renderer using WorkoutContent.sourceMarkdown. Add a small fixture Markdown string so the view can render a real workout section list.

title: Investigate xcodebuild DVTDeviceOperation warnings
description: xcodebuild emits warnings: 'DVTDeviceOperation: Encountered a build number  that is incompatible with DVTBuildVersion' and '[MT] IDERunDestination: Supported platforms for the buildables in the current scheme is empty.' Seen during CLI builds for ios/WorkoutApp/WorkoutApp.xcodeproj. Investigate root cause and possible mitigation (toolchain selection, destination config, or Xcode install state).

comments.author: aaston
comments.text:
Repro'd warning. Command line invocation:
    /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/usr/bin/xcodebuild logs  when enumerating CoreDevice list.  shows the paired Apple Watch (id 3D9A2314-77FC-56CF-B824-5B606611C8A7) has no OS version/build fields and is disconnected; iPhone reports build 23C55. Likely the empty build number is from the watch entry. Mitigations: connect/pair the watch so CoreDevice can populate OS build, update watchOS, or unpair/remove watch from Xcode Devices list (or disable automatic device discovery).  appears early but build succeeds with explicit simulator destination; likely Xcode 26.2 noise.

comments.author: aaston
comments.text: Correction: my prior comment was garbled by shell backticks. Findings: DVTDeviceOperation warning likely from paired Apple Watch entry with missing OS build info. devicectl details for watch id 3D9A2314-77FC-56CF-B824-5B606611C8A7 shows no osVersion/build and it is disconnected; iPhone reports osBuildUpdate 23C55. Xcode enumerates devices and logs build number "". Mitigation: connect/update watch or unpair/remove it from Xcode Devices list (or disable automatic device discovery). The IDERunDestination warning appears early but builds succeed with explicit simulator destination; likely Xcode 26.2 noise.

comments.author: aaston
comments.text: Investigated remaining IDERunDestination warning. It only appears when building with -scheme and -destination. Running xcodebuild with -target WorkoutApp -sdk iphonesimulator -configuration Debug produces no warning. This suggests an Xcode 26.2 issue with the implicit scheme/run destination resolution (no shared .xcscheme in repo). Mitigations: use -target + -sdk in CLI, or create/share an explicit scheme via Xcode (Manage Schemes -> Shared) to avoid the warning.

title: Build Workout Discovery screen skeleton
description: Create the primary entry screen with recommended list, browse/search entry points, and placeholder explanation text per item.

title: Exclude section headings/structure from search keyword indexing
description: Search currently matches structural section headings (e.g., Prep/Push/Pull) which yields noisy results. Restrict keyword indexing to content text (title, summary, items, prescriptions) and avoid section headings unless they appear in title/body.

title: Add unit tests for search tokenization of fractional queries
description: Create XCTest coverage for search tokenization of fractional queries (e.g., '1/4'), ensuring searches do not match workouts with separate numeric tokens from section headers (e.g., 'Push 1'). Use wa-vvi context.

title: Verify search tokenization for fractional queries (e.g., 1/4)
description: User reported search for 1/4 still matched workouts with separate '1' tokens in section headers (e.g., Prep / Push 1). Verify after tokenization change and tighten matching if false positives remain.

title: Wire knowledge base loader into discovery and detail UI
description: Replace mock workout data with KnowledgeBaseLoader output and render real Markdown sections in discovery/detail screens.
